title: Follow live: Yankees get on board to close the gap vs. Dodgers
author: ESPN

title: Sources: Colts bench Richardson, turn to Flacco
description: The Colts are benching 2023 first-round draft pick Anthony Richardson and turning to veteran Joe Flacco as their starting QB, sources tell ESPN.
author: Stephen Holder

title: Man Utd target Amorim yet to make decision about future
description: Sporting head coach Ruben Amorim says he has not yet made a decision about his future after Manchester United expressed an interest in appointing him as manager.

title: England's Slade and Spencer start against All Blacks
description: Centre Henry Slade will resume his starting role in England's midfield against New Zealand on Saturday despite playing only 54 minutes of club rugby this season.

title: Amorim could be Man Utd boss in time to face Chelsea
description: Man Utd are in advanced talks with Sporting head coach Ruben Amorim and he could be in charge for Sunday's Premier League clash with Chelsea, live on Sky Sports.

title: Man Utd in talks to appoint Sporting's Amorim
description: Manchester United have approached Sporting over appointing head coach Ruben Amorim as their new boss.

title: World Series Game 4 live updates: Like clockwork, Freddie Freeman homers for LA
description: The Bronx Bombers need their bats to come alive vs. home run machine Freeman and friends in a must-win tonight in New York. Follow the action here!
author: Yahoo Sports

title: Vikings reportedly trading for Jaguars left tackle Cam Robinson
description: The deal provides protection for Sam Darnold's blind slide after the season-ending injury to Christian Darrisaw. The Jaguars are parting with a left tackle who's started seven games this season protecting Trevor Lawrence.
author: Yahoo Sports
